bibl.title: Some Unique Medieval Nubian Textiles in the British Museum Collections.
Aegyptus et Nubia Christiana. The Włodzimierz Godlewski Jubilee Volume on the Occasion of his 70th Birthday.

bibl.note: Presents textiles manufactured on the site of Kulubnarti. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Julie Renee Anderson & Anna Harrison, Some Unique Medieval Nubian Textiles in the British Museum Collections.
A. Łajtar, A. Obłuski & I. Zych (edd.), Aegyptus et Nubia Christiana. The Włodzimierz Godlewski Jubilee Volume on the Occasion of his 70th Birthday (Warsaw, 2016) pp. 329-346, 2 tabl., 9 figg.
Presents textiles manufactured on the site of Kulubnarti. - Avec résumé en anglais.
